title: Riot girl Tristana dance doesn't work right
body:
She doesn't set down her cannon. She goes to set it down, but it kind of just gets stuck on her hand and moves around.

Please fix so I can spam Bandle Gunner tunes.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!

Nice!

I just got the free skin, so not sure if it has been a problem for long.
